roleset.name: act, working

example.name: function-v: with job
example.text: Arbitrage simply transfers his selling pressure from Chicago to New York , while functioning as a buyer in Chicago .

example.name: function-v: intransitive
example.text: The Asset Privatization Trust , the agency chiefly responsible for selling government - held properties , has recorded sales of more than $ 500 million since it began functioning in December 1986 .

example.name: functioning-n: Arg0, 1
example.text: Analyses also revealed that the detrimental effect of a leader 's avoidance was mediated by his functioning as a security provider .

example.name: function-n: arg 1 only
example.text: the function of white blood cells involved in the body 's immune response .

propbank.arg: of white blood cells involved in the body 's immune response

example.name: function-n: both args
example.text: The stock market 's basic function of raising capital

example.name: function-n: these are very confusing between arg 0 and arg1
example.text: a function of the measured snow

example.name: function-n: Nominal. These are very confusing between arg 0 and arg1, use your best judgement on cause versus affect

roleset.note: FUNCTION-V NOTES: Frames file for 'function' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'work' (from function.01-v predicate notes)
FUNCTION-N NOTES: Based on nouns-00080. Comparison to function.01-v. VN class masquerade-29.6. Framed by Katie. (from function.01-n)
